extendedInfo.description: This application has been written to aid Muslims and Students of Hifz who are familiar with the 13 line format of the Quran.The format uses a bold script, which is also known as Urdu/Persian Script, and is most commonly used in non-Arab countries.Features:Two Page Layout. Drag the page horizontally to see two pages side by side just like a printed Quran. Touch a page to turn.Easy horizontal scrolling of pages in Continuous Scrolling mode. (Switch between the Two Page mode and Continuous Scrolling mode from the Preferences screen)Portrait and Landscape view.Remembers the last page that was displayed.Juz and Surah Index. Press and hold the Juz name to select the desired quarter of the Juz.Easily go to a specific page number.Add multiple bookmarks.

reviews.title: Very good effort
reviews.comment: Jazakallaho khair., who has put  up efforts for this appl. Its works perfect. It would better if u convert it in XML files and also add highlight ing tool,  and book marks for revisions. Of huffaz. :-)
reviews.author: Hafiz Muneeb

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: Great app jazakallah,  if  possible please add audio, would benefit tremendously when one is not 100% sure of some words  .
reviews.author: Zahir Jean

reviews.title: Works Perfectly Alhamdulillah
reviews.comment: Jazakallah Khair May Allah Grant you Jannah.  For continuous scrolling:   1. Click setting button 2. Go to preferences 3. Tick the \"Continuous Scrolling\" 4. Restart the 13 Line Quran app  ... and now you can scroll continuously.
reviews.author: Mohammad Abubakar

reviews.title: What can be said about the Holy Qur\'an - the word of Allah Almighty
reviews.comment: EXCELLENT.. A must app for every muslim wanting to recite the world of Allah Almighty..

reviews.comment: Absolutely amazing. Was looking for a 13 liner Quran for the longest time. I also love the bookmark feature, it comes very handy.  whoever benefits from this app, may Allah give the developer the same reward.
